html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-04822019-05-09,  HC,  ,  ,  , 
ActPest Control Products Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Pest Control Products Regulations (Labelling)
PrecisRegulations Amending the PEST CONTROL PRODUCTS REGULATIONS (LABELLING) in order to (1) modernize labelling requirements across a variety of different pest control product container types, including large refillable containers, railway tank cars and transport truck tanker-trailers, as well as outer containers; and (2) address the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations request that Health Canada clarify the meaning of the term "Bulk container" (hence the application of the section 31 bulk container labelling provision of the Pest Control Products Regulations).
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0133 Publication Date: 2019-05-29
AttachmentsAttachment
